co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.DatasetManagementException

  • Packages that use DatasetManagementException 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api
    Interfaces for program and resource specifications, program lifecycle, runtime context and processors.
    co.cask.cdap.api.dataset
    Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch
    Interfaces for Spark plugins.

      Check whether a dataset exists in the current namespace.

      Delete a dataset instance.

      Get the type of a dataset.

      Truncate a dataset, that is, delete all its data.
      void Admin.updateDataset(String name, DatasetProperties properties)
      Update an existing dataset with new properties.

    • Uses of DatasetManagementException in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

      Subclasses of DatasetManagementException in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IncompatibleUpdateException
      Exception thrown when a dataset instance is reconfigured in an incompatible way.
      class  InstanceConflictException
      Thrown when operation conflicts with existing dataset instances available in the system.
      class  InstanceNotFoundException
      Thrown for an operation on a non-existing dataset instance.
